explanation: [0-0] Two men are standing at a white table with a white bowl and several rows of Kinder Surprise eggs on it. In front of each man, there are three empty transparent cups and a blue bottle filled with water, with a ping pong ball on the bottle's mouth. The man on the left, wearing a blue hoodie and jeans, looks down at the ping pong ball in front of him. The man on the right, wearing a purple hoodie and black pants, also looks down at the ping pong ball. A white wall can be seen behind them.

[0-2] Next, the two men extend a finger to touch the ping pong balls. The man on the left fails to make the ball drop into the cup and catches it with his hand, putting it back on the bottle's mouth. The man on the right successfully bounces the ball into the first cup and immediately picks up the bottle to pour water into it.
